When are you going to upload day 1 in 720p? :)

I think that if this is so-called "Day 2" it must be the second day that CTV broadcast the event finals, supposing they didn't even broadcast Day 1, because the one in this torrent is actually Day 3 of Apparatus finals, but it's also the one I was most looking forward to download after having watched it live on the BBC website (it doesn't air in California until monetized-primetime which is 13+ hours after it actually happens and they don't even show all the routines).

So I'm guessing CTV didn't broadcast the real Day 1 which means there will be no Day 1 upload...the "Mixed Finals" torrent uploaded earlier is actually "Apparatus finals Day 2".

@aquaninja, you're absolutely right. I couldn't find the first day any where, but the second and third day (this torrent) are available but I hope Sceneline uploads the events of the second day in 720p, the file is there but no one has uploaded it yet :( ...

I hope we will have the remeining 2 events ( Men's individual all-around and Apparatus' finals Day 1) soon.
